  • Constructor Details

    • Spritesheet

      public Spritesheet(Texture texture, int spriteWidth, int spriteHeight, int numSprites, int spacing)
      Construct spritesheet with all fields
      Parameters:
      texture - the texture to use as an atlas
      spriteWidth - the width of a single sprite
      spriteHeight - the height of a single sprite
      numSprites - the number of sprites in the atlas
      spacing - the padding between sprites
